name: CustomGuard Penetrating Sealer for Natural Stone and Tile - 2 qt.
description: TileLab SurfaceGard Penetrating Sealer provides unsurpassed invisible protection for marble, stone, porcelain, quarry and Saltillo tile, grout, concrete and masonry. This long-lasting, water-based sealer actually repels dirt, oil and stains allowing for easy cleanup. Use when maximum protection is required such as in food preparation areas, floors and other high traffic areas.Low odor, pH neutral and non-abrasiveAllows moisture vapor transmissionFor interior and exterior useCan also be used in place of a grout release
